text: and symptoms of Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, kyphoscoliosis type? The signs and symptoms of Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS), kyphoscoliosis type vary but may include: Hyperextensible skin that is fragile and bruises easily Joint hypermobility that leads to frequent dislocations and subluxations (partial dislocations) Severe hypotonia at birth Progressive kyphoscoliosis (kyphosis and scoliosis), present at birth or within the first year of life Scleral fragility Abnormal wound healing ""Marfanoid habitu
